content.en: Algorithmic Bioprocess Optimization: Scientists are using algorithms to tackle various challenges in bioprocess control and optimization. These algorithms are being used to design control methods based on the metabolic network of organisms, compare and transfer process models across different scales and modes of operation, optimize feeding and media conditions for cell culture processes, and much more. By harnessing the power of algorithms, researchers are able to improve productivity, optimize fermentation processes, generate accurate models, analyze data, and optimize bioprocesses in the field of biotechnology and pharmaceutical development.
content.da: Algoritmisk Bioprocesoptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer inden for bioprocesstyring og optimering. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at designe kontrolmetoder baseret på organismers metaboliske netværk, sammenligne og overføre procesmodeller på tværs af forskellige skalaer og driftsformer, optimere fodrings- og mediationsbetingelser for cellekulturprocesser og meget mere. Ved at udnytte algoritmernes kraft kan forskere forbedre produktiviteten, optimere fermenteringsprocesser, generere præcise modeller, analysere data og optimere bioprocesser inden for bioteknologi og farmaceutisk udvikling.
